companies.name: BlindSimulator
companies.description:
BlindSimulator leverages XR technology to support inclusive urban development and accessibility-driven public policy.
Our immersive simulation enables policymakers, educators, and citizens to experience the challenges faced by people with visual impairments, fostering empathy and informed decision-making.
We help governments advance social equity, universal design, and human-centered innovation through experiential technology.
